EmailTemplate.description: to send to new hires week 0
EmailTemplate.name: Welcome to Copado New AE
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Copado!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
http://copado.com
Welcome to Copado!
We are so excited to have you join us on this incredible journey.
What's Next
You will be completing a tailored Onboarding program over the next 4 weeks that will give you important tools and knowledge to be successful. Taking this time to master our products, ecosystem, and competitive landscape will allow you to hit the ground running.
Agenda Snapshot
Monday
10-11am CST: Welcome to Copado
12-2pm CST: New Hire HR Orientation
3-4pm CST: IT Check In
Tuesday
8-9am CST: Copado Sales Process
10-11am CST: All Hands Accelerate Session
All calendar invites will show up on your Copado google calendar once you are able to log into your laptop. (If there are any conflicts or access issues please advise ASAP)
Your Onboarding Team
Sales Enablement
Kristi McNabb Lisa Maguire
HR
Scotty Morrison Jaime Djuric
